verbose_text: Some published literature states that CXCL12 alone will not increase the proliferation of mouse cerebellum granule cells, and blocking CXCR4 with a specific antagonist impairs the growth factor induced progression of NPCs through the cell cycle [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CXCL12 alone will not increase the proliferation of mouse cerebellum granule cells, and blocking CXCR4
